text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ

translation.en: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record
translation.id: (Adapun orang yang kitabnya861) diberikan di tangan kanannya, maka dia berkata, "Ambillah, bacalah kitabku (ini)
